title: How does literacy break mirror invariance in the visual system?
authors: F Pegado, K Nakamura, T Hannagan - Frontiers in psychology
excerpt: A growing literature has been showing a profound impact of alphabetization at several levels of the visual system, including the primary visual cortex (Szwed et al., 2014) and higher-order ventral and dorsal visual areas (Carreiras et al., 2009; Dehaene et al., 2010).  ...

title: What is special about orthographic processing?
authors: J Grainger, T Hannagan - Written Language & Literacy
excerpt: Starting from a generic architecture for reading words in alphabetic scripts, we examine the special status of letters as the building block of single word reading. After briefly describing the overall architecture that defines the interaction between orthographic and  ...
